name: A Soft and Gentle Place
description:
CONTROLS 

Mouse pan to look around, click to get information on flowers.

ESC to quit.

DESCRIPTION

A demo for a student project, and my first solo development project.

In its current state, does not contain any gameplay progression or set end: it's simply a peaceful garden space that you can look around and enjoy.

The flower meanings are based on Victorian floriography, where bouquets of flowers were used to send messages of love (and sometimes hate).
